title: Getting some weird freeze/lag where I can see everything else moving around perfectly except for me
body:
Please don't tell me the only way to fix this is to be on a wired connection :(

I don't know why this is randomly happening today. It rarely occurs but today, it's frequent.

replies.body: I agree with DTN that there seems to be a network issue causing input delay, and it could be packet loss.  You can rune a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of these matches.  The [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide would be your best bet towards getting this resolved and strengthen up your connection.  Reach out if you have any questions!
Are you rubber-banding or is the game slow to respond to your inputs, or is it something else?
I'll just stop moving for a while, I'll be able to see people moving smoothly as if I was not lagging. Then after a while, I start rubber-banding, then I unfreeze for a while.
